      • saisieClavier

        public static java.lang.String saisieClavier()
        Get user's keyboard input
        Returns:
        The typed string

      • saisieNombre

        public static int saisieNombre(java.lang.String texte)
        Get a keyboard inputed integer.
        If the input isn't an integer an error is displayed and the user has to redo.
        Parameters:
        texte - A text to display before the input (Empty string to ignore)
        Returns:
        The inputed integer

      • saisieNombre

        public static int saisieNombre(java.lang.String texte,
                               int min)
        Get a keyboard inputed integer greater than a given minimum.
        If the input doesn't respect the conditions an error is displayed and the user has to redo.
        Parameters:
        texte - A text to display before the input (Empty string to ignore)
        min - The minimum to check against
        Returns:
        The inputed integer

      • saisieNombre

        public static int saisieNombre(java.lang.String texte,
                               java.lang.Integer min,
                               int max)
        Get a keyboard inputed integer inside a given interval.
        If the input doesn't respect the conditions an error is displayed and the user has to redo.
        Parameters:
        texte - A text to display before the input (Empty string to ignore)
        min - The minimum to check against (null to ignore)
        max - The maximum to check against
        Returns:
        The inputed integer
